title: Emergency System Restore: Fix Blank Screen and Rebuild AXON SOVEREIGN Application

requirements.summary: Fix all syntax errors causing blank screen by ensuring proper bracket closure throughout the codebase
acceptanceCriteria: Application loads without blank screen
No console errors related to syntax
All code blocks have matching opening and closing brackets

file_operations.description: Audit and fix any unclosed curly braces, square brackets, or parentheses in the router configuration and component structure
Verify all JSX tags, provider wrappers, and React.StrictMode blocks are properly closed
Check and fix bracket closure in form state management, event handlers, and conditional rendering logic

requirements.summary: Implement Single Page Application structure with auth-page and dashboard-page div sections that toggle visibility
acceptanceCriteria: App uses two main div sections with IDs 'auth-page' and 'dashboard-page'
Only one section is visible at a time
Dashboard page is hidden by default on initial load
View switching is handled through display style property

file_operations.description: Restructure the page to use a root div with id='auth-page' wrapping all authentication content including sign-in and registration views

Wrap the entire dashboard content in a div with id='dashboard-page' and style='display:none' as the default state. Add visibility toggle logic based on authentication state from localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER
Update routing logic to support SPA view toggling between auth-page and dashboard-page sections using display style changes instead of full route navigation

requirements.summary: Restore glassmorphic login panel with Full Name registration field matching reference design
acceptanceCriteria: Login panel uses glassmorphism styling
Registration form includes Full Name field
Visual design matches reference image frontend/public/assets/generated/images (4).jpeg
Panel displays on auth-page section

file_operations.description: Add Full Name input field as the first field in the registration form. Ensure the field is included in form state and validation logic
Apply glassmorphism styling with backdrop-blur, semi-transparent backgrounds, and tactical scanline overlay to match the reference image frontend/public/assets/generated/images (4).jpeg
Ensure AuthPanel component wraps both SignInView and RegisterView, maintaining glassmorphic appearance throughout the authentication flow

requirements.summary: Fix registration flow to save user data to localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER and immediately display dashboard
acceptanceCriteria: Registration saves to localStorage key 'AXON_MASTER_USER'
Dashboard view displays immediately after successful registration
No loading states or delays between registration and dashboard display
User data persists across page refreshes

file_operations.description: Update registration submission handler to save user data (including Full Name, email) to localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER using JSON.stringify. Immediately trigger view change to dashboard by setting display style on auth-page to 'none' and dashboard-page to 'block'
Update registerUser function to include fullName field in the user object structure and persist to localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER
Add view toggle function that sets document.getElementById('auth-page').style.display = 'none' and document.getElementById('dashboard-page').style.display = 'block' upon successful registration

requirements.summary: Restore dashboard sidebar navigation with five sections: Command Center, Neural Lab, Sentinel Protocol, Device Sync, and Vault
acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar contains exactly five navigation items in order
Navigation items match reference design from frontend/public/assets/generated/sc.png
Each section is clickable and navigates to appropriate view
Active section is visually indicated

file_operations.description: Update sidebar navigation array to include exactly five items in order: Command Center, Neural Lab, Sentinel Protocol, Device Sync, and Vault. Ensure each has appropriate icon, label, and route path. Add active state styling with emerald highlight matching frontend/public/assets/generated/sc.png
Verify that all five navigation sections have corresponding content areas or component imports to display when selected

acceptanceCriteria: Asset Shield displays starting value of ₹1,241,310 in Indian Rupee format
Asset Shield value increments automatically in real-time
Neural Ingest includes a text input field for links
Vocal Health displays as a visual gauge component
All three components are positioned in a horizontal row

file_operations.description: Set initial value to ₹1,241,310 formatted with Indian Rupee symbol. Ensure the auto-increment interval adds small random amounts every 2 seconds to create a live ticker effect
Verify the component contains a text input field for meeting links with verification button functionality
Ensure the component displays as a circular gauge showing vocal health percentage (98.4/100) with SVG gradient ring
Position AssetShieldCard, NeuralIngestInput, and VocalHealthCard components in a horizontal row layout (flex or grid) as the KPI row section at the top of the dashboard

requirements.summary: Add real-time animating Waveform visualization labeled 'Live Spectral Analysis' in dashboard center
acceptanceCriteria: Waveform renders in the center dashboard area
Animation runs continuously in real-time
Component is labeled 'Live Spectral Analysis'
Waveform uses smooth, fluid animation

file_operations.description: Verify the component renders an animated canvas with sine wave visualization using requestAnimationFrame. Ensure the card title displays 'Live Spectral Analysis' prominently
Position SpectralAnalysisCard in the center section of the dashboard layout below the KPI row

requirements.summary: Add Synopsis Engine component in the center of the dashboard alongside waveform visualization
acceptanceCriteria: Synopsis Engine displays in center dashboard area
Component is positioned near or with the waveform
Synopsis Engine has distinct visual identity

file_operations.description: Verify the component displays loading spinner and 'awaiting verified intel link' message with distinct styling to differentiate from SpectralAnalysisCard
Position SynopsisEngineCard adjacent to or below SpectralAnalysisCard in the center dashboard area, creating a two-column or stacked layout

requirements.summary: Add three-tier subscription pricing cards under Vault section with Free, ₹299/month, and ₹499/month tiers
acceptanceCriteria: Vault section contains three subscription cards
Tiers are priced at Free, ₹299, and ₹499
Pricing displays in Indian Rupee format with /month suffix
Cards are visually distinct and comparable

file_operations.description: Update pricing tiers to display Free (₹0), Core (₹299/month), and Shield (₹499/month). Ensure Indian Rupee formatting is consistent across all tier cards
Verify pricing display includes ₹ symbol and /month suffix. Ensure cards support Free tier with ₹0 pricing and special 'Get Started' or 'Current Plan' button text
Add navigation to Vault section that displays the SubscriptionTiers component or include PricingTable component with the three pricing tiers

requirements.summary: Display registered user's Full Name dynamically in dashboard sidebar, removing hardcoded 'Nishant' references
acceptanceCriteria: User's Full Name from registration displays in sidebar
Name updates dynamically based on logged-in user
No hardcoded names like 'Nishant' appear anywhere
Name is retrieved from localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER

file_operations.description: Remove any hardcoded 'Nishant' references. Retrieve user data from localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER using JSON.parse, extract the fullName or name field, and display it dynamically in the sidebar user profile section
Remove any hardcoded user names. Retrieve and display the Full Name from localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER in the user profile display area

requirements.summary: Add Logout button to dashboard that clears session and returns to auth-page
acceptanceCriteria: Logout button is visible in the dashboard
Clicking logout clears localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER
View switches to auth-page after logout
User must re-authenticate after logout

file_operations.description: Verify Tactical Exit button clears localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER and triggers view switch by setting document.getElementById('dashboard-page').style.display = 'none' and document.getElementById('auth-page').style.display = 'block'
Add a logout button in the sidebar that calls localStorage.removeItem('AXON_MASTER_USER') and toggles view back to auth-page
Add or verify logout function that clears localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER and any related session data

requirements.summary: Implement login validation with 'Invalid Credentials' toast notification on failure
acceptanceCriteria: Failed login attempts trigger validation
Toast notification displays with text 'Invalid Credentials'
Toast appears on screen temporarily and dismisses
User remains on auth-page after failed login

file_operations.description: Add login validation logic that checks credentials against localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER. On validation failure, trigger toast notification with message 'Invalid Credentials' using the toast utility from shadcn/ui
Add or verify validateLogin function that compares submitted credentials with stored user data in localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER and returns boolean success/failure result
Ensure login failure handling prevents view switching to dashboard-page and keeps user on auth-page until successful authentication

requirements.summary: Implement secret bypass: clicking AXON logo 3 times force-shows Dashboard as Sovereign Administrator with ₹499 plan
acceptanceCriteria: AXON logo tracks click count
After exactly 3 clicks, dashboard view displays immediately
User identity is set to 'Sovereign Administrator'
Subscription tier is set to ₹499 plan
Bypass works from auth-page without requiring credentials
Click counter resets after successful bypass or timeout

file_operations.description: Add click event handler to the AXON logo that tracks click count using useState. On the third click within a reasonable timeframe, create a bypass user object with fullName: 'Sovereign Administrator', save to localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER, set subscription tier to 'shield' (₹499) in localStorage, and immediately toggle view to dashboard-page. Reset click counter after 2 seconds of inactivity or successful bypass
Ensure the AXON logo is rendered as a clickable element (button or div with onClick) that propagates click events to parent LoginPage for bypass tracking

Add createBypassUser function that generates a master user object with fullName: 'Sovereign Administrator', email: 'admin@axon.sovereign', and subscription: 'shield', then saves to localStorage.AXON_MASTER_USER
